alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 12:47PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of the Champlain Valley and the northern and central Green Mountains through 145 PM EST... At 1246 PM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line extending from Georgia Center to Waltham. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a mile and a quick accumulation of snow up to an inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility and snow accumulations may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington International Airport, Middlebury, South Burlington, Burlington, Vergennes, Cambridge, Waterbury Village, Westford, Colchester, Essex Junction Village, Georgia, Waterville, Addison, Ripton, St. Albans Town, Milton, Shelburne, Charlotte and Bakersfield. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 60 and 116.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
